Reactome ORA per quadrant (using pathwayOverrepresent)

enrich_reactome_quadrants.Rd

Wraps a convenience pipeline:

  • builds Reactome TERM2GENE via msigdbr

  • runs pathwayOverrepresent on each quadrant (Q1..Q4)

  • returns top-k barplots (−log10 p) and tidy tables

Usage

enrich_reactome_quadrants(
  df,
  universe,
  species = "Homo sapiens",
  top_terms = 5,
  palette = c(Q1 = "#33DBB2", Q2 = "#DFB647", Q3 = "#2ECEF8", Q4 = "#76CF49")
)

Arguments

df

data.frame with columns: gene, delta, quadrant (Q1..Q4)

universe

character vector of background gene symbols (e.g., rownames(discovery.cohort))

species

msigdbr species (default "Homo sapiens")

top_terms

how many top terms per quadrant to plot (default 5)

palette

named colors for bars of Q1..Q4

Value

list with:

results

named list of data.frames p1..p4 (or NULL if no hits)

barplot_df

tidy data.frame used for plotting

plot

ggpubr patch of 4 panels
